about_the_game: This DLC offers 32 images to enhance your base game experience. Immerse yourself in stunning artwork! Please note that some images may feature mature content.

content_descriptors.notes:
The puzzle images featuring nudity and sexual content. May not be suitable for all viewers.
All characters depicted in the game are above the age of 21.

detailed_description: This DLC offers 32 images to enhance your base game experience. Immerse yourself in stunning artwork! Please note that some images may feature mature content.
name: HALLOWEEN girls - Free 18+ DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with DirectX 11.0
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: This DLC adds 32 more images for the base game!
